questions.quote: It's because of her that bottle got broke that I was going to give to Charles Grodin on his show.
Oh.  Mr Kramer, you had a ten-thirty appointment. It's two o'clock. Mr Shellbach had a tennis lesson. He's gone for the day.
The door? Why would I go out the door? The window's right here.
What are you talking about? I'm the one who should have called the police. They stole my wallet.
To be honest with you. Nobody really knows. He seems to have disappeared.
Boy, a little too much chlorine in that gene pool.  And, you know, the thing is, they're never gonna know, no one's ever gonna tell them.
Well, what is it you object to? The comfort? The Speed? The convenience?
Grime, grease, filth, funk, ooze. Whatever it is, you take that stuff and put it right on my leather upholstery.
Don't go. Kramer! Come back. I got great news. Well, I did it.
Oh no. Sure. It matters. Wow. I've broken through, huh. I'm part of popular culture now. Listen I've got to thank Mr. Peterman.
